body:
Comment 4: 
If we implemented my suggested heuristic, here are the functions that would no longer be
grouped with a type.

In "debug/elf", unassociating func elf.Open from type File
In "debug/macho", unassociating func macho.Open from type File
In "debug/pe", unassociating func pe.Open from type File
In "html/template", unassociating func template.Must from type Template
In "html/template", unassociating func template.ParseGlob from type Template
In "html/template", unassociating func template.ParseFiles from type Template
In "log/syslog", unassociating func syslog.Dial from type Writer
In "net/http", unassociating func http.ReadRequest from type Request
In "net/rpc", unassociating func rpc.DialHTTP from type Client
In "net/rpc", unassociating func rpc.DialHTTPPath from type Client
In "net/rpc", unassociating func rpc.Dial from type Client
In "net/smtp", unassociating func smtp.Dial from type Client
In "net/textproto", unassociating func textproto.Dial from type Conn
In "old/netchan", unassociating func netchan.Import from type Importer
In "old/template", unassociating func template.ParseFile from type Template
In "old/template", unassociating func template.Parse from type Template
In "old/template", unassociating func template.MustParseFile from type Template
In "old/template", unassociating func template.MustParse from type Template
In "os", unassociating func os.Create from type File
In "os", unassociating func os.Open from type File
In "os", unassociating func os.OpenFile from type File
In "os", unassociating func os.Pipe from type File
In "reflect", unassociating func reflect.AppendSlice from type Value
In "reflect", unassociating func reflect.MakeMap from type Value
In "reflect", unassociating func reflect.Append from type Value
In "reflect", unassociating func reflect.MakeChan from type Value
In "reflect", unassociating func reflect.Indirect from type Value
In "reflect", unassociating func reflect.ValueOf from type Value
In "reflect", unassociating func reflect.MakeSlice from type Value
In "reflect", unassociating func reflect.Zero from type Value
In "text/template", unassociating func template.Must from type Template
In "text/template", unassociating func template.ParseGlob from type Template
In "text/template", unassociating func template.ParseFiles from type Template
In "time", unassociating func time.AfterFunc from type Timer
_Owner changed to **builder@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **Thinking**._
